item.title: UT-201 East - Exit 15C
item.description: UT-201 East at Exit 15C - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: US-89 North at UT-68
item.description: US-89 North at UT-68 (W 500 S) in Bountiful.

item.title: US-89 North Approaching UT-68
item.description: US-89 North Approaching UT-68 (W 500 S) in Bountiful. Turn left on UT-68/W 500 S for I-15 South. Continue north on US-89 for I-15 north.

item.title: UT-68 South Approaching UT-194 East
item.description: UT-68 South approaching UT-194 East (W 2100 North). UT-194 north is an expressway connection between UT-68 and I-15 in Lehi. It will eventually connect to the Mountain View Corridor.

item.title: I-215 South - Exits 13 and 12
item.description: I-215 south at Exit 13 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Approaching Exit 12 - I-15/Salt Lake/Provo.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15C-A
item.description: UT-201 west at Exit 15C - UT-68/Redwood Road and Exit 15B - I-215 North. Approaching Exit 15A - I-215 South.

item.title: UT-201 West - Exits 15 C-B
item.description: UT-201 west approaching Exits 15 C-B - I-215 North/UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 south at US-6 in Elberta. Turn right on US-6 west for Eureka and Delta.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 south at US-6 in Elberta. Turn right on US-6 west for Eureka and Delta.

item.title: End UT-68 South at US-6
item.description: End UT-68 South at US-6 in Elberta.

item.title: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 South at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing). Turn right on UT-145 for access to UT-73.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8570 North to Lehi. Continue south on UT-68 to Elberta.

item.title: UT-68 South at West 8750 North
item.description: UT-68 South at West 8750 North to Cedar Fort, Eagle Mountain, and Camp Floyd State Park and Museum.

item.title: UT-68 South at UT-85 South to I-15
item.description: UT-68 South at UT-85 South to I-15. This stretch of UT-85 between UT-68 and I-15 at Lehi is the southern part of the Mountain View Corridor.

item.title: UT-68 (Redwood Road) South/UT-85 South
item.description: UT-68 (Redwood Road) South/UT-85 South at the north end of the expressway section of UT-85 between I-15 and UT-68. Continue south on UT-68/UT-85 for the southbound expressway.

item.title: UT-68 South - Utah County
item.description: Entering Utah County on UT-68 south.

item.title: UT-201 East - Exits 15B and 15C
item.description: UT-201 east at Exit 15B - I-215 North. Approaching Exit 15C - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: UT-68 North at UT-154 (Bangerter Highway)
item.description: UT-68 North at UT-154 (Bangerter Highway) in Bluffdale.

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Camp Williams Exits
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Camp Williams Exits. Camp Williams exits are Main Gate, Truck Gate, and Veterans Cemetery.

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Lehi
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West in Lehi

item.title: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - Mountain View
item.description: UT-68 North/UT-85 West - UT-85/Mountain View (Corridor) - 3.5 miles north.

item.title: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing)
item.description: UT-68 North at UT-145 (Pioneer Crossing) in Saratoga Springs. Use UT-145 west to UT-73; UT-145 east to I-15.

item.title: UT-68 North approaching UT-145
item.description: UT-68 North approaching UT-145 in Saratoga Springs.

item.title: UT-68 West at I-15
item.description: UT-68 West at I-15. Use I-15 north to Ogden; I-15 south to Salt Lake City.

item.title: UT-68 East at US-89
item.description: UT-68 East at US-89 in Bountiful.

item.title: I-15 Exit 316 Offramp at UT-68
item.description: I-15 Exit 316 Offramp at UT-68 (West 500 South). Turn left for Woods Cross and West Bountiful. Turn right for Bountiful.

item.title: I-15 North - Exit 316
item.description: I-15 north at Exit 316 - UT-68/500 South. Approaching Exit 317 - UT-106 East/400 North.

item.title: I-215 North - Exit 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117, 118, and 120
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.title: I-80 East - Exits 117 and 118
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Ogden/Provo. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.title: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) North - Exit 4
item.description: Legacy Parkway (UT-67) north at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: I-215 North - Exits 26 and 27
item.description: I-215 north at Exit 26 - UT-67/Legacy Parkway. Approaching Exit 27 - UT-68/Redwood Road. Continue north on I-215 for I-15 and Ogden. Trucks are not allowed to use Legacy Parkway.

item.title: UT-68 South (Redwood Road) at I-215 East
item.description: UT-68 South (Redwood Road) at I-215 east onramp in Taylorsville. This is the southern intersection of I-215 with UT-68.

item.description: UT-67 south at Exit 4 - To UT-68/500 South.

item.title: I-80 East - Exit 118
item.description: I-80 east at Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road.

item.description: I-80 east at Exit 117 - I-215/Odgen/Provo. I-215 is the Salt Lake City Belt Route. Approaching Exit 118 - UT-68/Redwood Road, and Exit 120 - I-15.

item.description: I-15 north at Exit 316 - UT-68/500 South.
